mapper.select: select * from keshi_detail where id=#{ksd.id} and Company =#{c}
mapper.delete: delete from keshi_detail where id=#{ksd.id} and Company =#{c}
mapper.select: select student_name,teacher_name,course,sum(keshi) as keshi , MIN(riqi) as riqi from keshi_detail where Company = #{c} group by student_name,teacher_name,course,Company

select teacher_name,course,sum(keshi) as keshi,jine,sum(jine*keshi) as gongzi from keshi_detail where Company =#{c}
and riqi like "%"#{a}"%"
and teacher_name like "%"#{b}"%"
group by teacher_name,course,jine order by teacher_name

select teacher_name,course,sum(keshi) as keshi,jine,sum(jine*keshi) as gongzi from keshi_detail where Company =#{c}
and riqi LIKE '%' + #{a} + '%'
and teacher_name LIKE '%' + #{b} + '%'
group by teacher_name,course,jine order by teacher_name
